title: Venus - Computer Simulated Global View Centered at 0 Degrees East Longitude
description: This global view of the surface of Venus is centered at 0 degrees east longitude. NASA Magellan synthetic aperture radar mosaics from the first cycle of Magellan mapping were mapped onto a computer-simulated globe to create this image.   http://photojournal.jpl.nasa.gov/catalog/PIA00257
